name: @tpmjs/tools-postmark
description: Postmark email API tools for AI agents. Send emails, manage templates, bounces, domains, webhooks, and more.

tools.name: sendEmail
tools.description: Send a single transactional email via Postmark.

tools.name: sendBatchEmails
tools.description: Send a batch of up to 500 emails in a single API call.

tools.name: sendEmailWithTemplate
tools.description: Send an email using a Postmark template.

tools.name: sendBatchWithTemplates
tools.description: Send a batch of templated emails in a single API call.

tools.name: sendBulkEmail
tools.description: Submit a bulk email job for large-scale sending.

tools.name: getBulkEmailStatus
tools.description: Get the status of a bulk email job.

tools.name: getDeliveryStats
tools.description: Get delivery statistics including bounce counts by type.

tools.name: searchBounces
tools.description: Search bounces with optional filters.

tools.name: getBounce
tools.description: Get details of a specific bounce by ID.

tools.name: getBounceDump
tools.description: Get the raw SMTP dump for a specific bounce.

tools.name: activateBounce
tools.description: Activate a bounced email address to allow sending again.

tools.name: listTemplates
tools.description: List email templates with optional filtering.

tools.name: getTemplate
tools.description: Get details of a specific template.

tools.name: createTemplate
tools.description: Create a new email template.

tools.name: updateTemplate
tools.description: Update an existing email template.

tools.name: deleteTemplate
tools.description: Delete an email template.

tools.name: validateTemplate
tools.description: Validate template content and model.

tools.name: pushTemplates
tools.description: Push templates from one server to another.

tools.name: getServer
tools.description: Get the current server configuration.

tools.name: updateServer
tools.description: Update the current server configuration.

tools.name: listServers
tools.description: List all servers in the account.

tools.name: getServerById
tools.description: Get a specific server by ID.

tools.name: createServer
tools.description: Create a new server in the account.

tools.name: updateServerById
tools.description: Update a specific server by ID.

tools.name: deleteServer
tools.description: Delete a server from the account.

tools.name: listMessageStreams
tools.description: List all message streams for the server.

tools.name: getMessageStream
tools.description: Get details of a specific message stream.

tools.name: createMessageStream
tools.description: Create a new message stream.

tools.name: updateMessageStream
tools.description: Update a message stream's properties.

tools.name: archiveMessageStream
tools.description: Archive a message stream.

tools.name: unarchiveMessageStream
tools.description: Unarchive a previously archived message stream.

tools.name: searchOutboundMessages
tools.description: Search outbound messages with optional filters.

tools.name: getOutboundMessageDetails
tools.description: Get full details of a specific outbound message.

tools.name: getOutboundMessageDump
tools.description: Get the raw SMTP dump of an outbound message.

tools.name: getOutboundMessageOpens
tools.description: Get open events for a specific outbound message.

tools.name: getOutboundMessageClicks
tools.description: Get click events for a specific outbound message.

tools.name: searchInboundMessages
tools.description: Search inbound messages with optional filters.

tools.name: getInboundMessageDetails
tools.description: Get full details of a specific inbound message.

tools.name: bypassInboundRules
tools.description: Bypass inbound rules for a specific message.

tools.name: retryInboundMessage
tools.description: Retry processing of an inbound message.

tools.name: searchMessageOpens
tools.description: Search message open events across all messages.

tools.name: searchMessageClicks
tools.description: Search message click events across all messages.

tools.name: getStatsOverview
tools.description: Get an overview of outbound email statistics.

tools.name: getStatsSends
tools.description: Get send count statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsBounces
tools.description: Get bounce statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsSpamComplaints
tools.description: Get spam complaint statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsTracked
tools.description: Get tracked email statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsOpens
tools.description: Get email open statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsOpensByPlatform
tools.description: Get email open statistics grouped by platform.

tools.name: getStatsOpensByClient
tools.description: Get email open statistics grouped by email client.

tools.name: getStatsClicks
tools.description: Get link click statistics over time.

tools.name: getStatsClicksByBrowser
tools.description: Get link click statistics grouped by browser.

tools.name: getStatsClicksByPlatform
tools.description: Get link click statistics grouped by platform.

tools.name: getStatsClicksByLocation
tools.description: Get link click statistics grouped by geographic location.

tools.name: listDomains
tools.description: List all domains in the account.

tools.name: getDomain
tools.description: Get details of a specific domain.

tools.name: createDomain
tools.description: Create a new sending domain.

tools.name: updateDomain
tools.description: Update a domain's return-path.

tools.name: deleteDomain
tools.description: Delete a domain from the account.

tools.name: verifyDomainDkim
tools.description: Trigger DKIM verification for a domain.

tools.name: verifyDomainReturnPath
tools.description: Trigger return-path verification for a domain.

tools.name: verifyDomainSpf
tools.description: Trigger SPF verification for a domain.

tools.name: rotateDomainDkim
tools.description: Rotate DKIM keys for a domain.

tools.name: listSenderSignatures
tools.description: List all sender signatures in the account.

tools.name: getSenderSignature
tools.description: Get details of a specific sender signature.

tools.name: createSenderSignature
tools.description: Create a new sender signature.

tools.name: updateSenderSignature
tools.description: Update an existing sender signature.

tools.name: deleteSenderSignature
tools.description: Delete a sender signature.

tools.name: resendSenderConfirmation
tools.description: Resend the confirmation email for a sender signature.

tools.name: listWebhooks
tools.description: List all webhooks for the server.

tools.name: getWebhook
tools.description: Get details of a specific webhook.

tools.name: createWebhook
tools.description: Create a new webhook.

tools.name: updateWebhook
tools.description: Update an existing webhook.

tools.name: deleteWebhook
tools.description: Delete a webhook.

tools.name: listSuppressions
tools.description: List suppressed email addresses for a message stream.

tools.name: createSuppressions
tools.description: Add email addresses to the suppression list.

tools.name: deleteSuppressions
tools.description: Remove email addresses from the suppression list.

tools.name: listInboundRules
tools.description: List all inbound processing rules.

tools.name: createInboundRule
tools.description: Create a new inbound processing rule.

tools.name: deleteInboundRule
tools.description: Delete an inbound processing rule.

tools.name: createDataRemoval
tools.description: Request removal of personal data.

tools.name: getDataRemovalStatus
tools.description: Get the status of a data removal request.
